messages.subject: postcards
messages.msgSnippet: A while back someone had asked for postcards for her kids. this is a website by a couple who is traveling to the capittols of all 50 states and sending
messages.messageBody:
A while back someone had asked for postcards for her kids. this is a website by a couple who is traveling to the capittols of all 50 states and sending electronic postcards:
  http://www.postcardsfrom.com
Debra

messages.subject: postcards
messages.msgSnippet: We will be happy to send postcards in response, if you put your address on the postcard it would help as I have a terrible memory and put things up to keep
messages.messageBody:
We will be happy to send postcards in response, if you put your address
on the postcard it would help as I have a terrible memory and put things
up to keep them and it takes weeks to find where I put them. Our address
is
David, Keith and Erick Holden
827 East "A" Street
Casper, Wyoming 82601

Thank you all for helping me with the kids education, it makes it so much
easier for me to have friends to turn to.
Sharon
